name: Peanomachine
body:
### Welcome to PeanoMachine Pages.

This repository contains code that support the implementation fo the Machine of Peano. To install it on your computer, just execute the following commands:

```
$ git clone git://github.com/mosser/PeanoMachine.git
$ cd PeanoMachine
```

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with PeanoMachine? Don't hesitate to contact its main author!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
